topic.title: Data Structures
topic.shortdesc: You can use complex data structures such as maps and lists in Couchbase. These data structures may be manipulated with basic operations without retrieving and storing the entire document.

body.p: Data structures in Couchbase are currently an uncommitted feature and are not yet implemented in PHP. This document will be updated as a PHP implementation becomes available.

Data structures as implemented in other SDKs are stored as JSON documents in Couchbase, and can therefore be accessed using N1QL, Full Text Search, and normal key-value operations. Data structures can also be manipulated using the traditional sub-document and full-document KV APIs.
